headline: Assessing Sabre (SABR) Valuation As AI Travel Alliance With PayPal And Mindtrip Gains Attention
summary: Sabre (SABR) is back in focus after unveiling a high-profile alliance with PayPal and Mindtrip to build an AI-driven travel assistant that connects inspiration, trip planning, booking, and payments in one conversational flow. See our latest analysis for Sabre. Despite the high-profile AI partnership and a series of recent product and client announcements across airlines and lodging, Sabre’s share price performance has been weak. The company has recorded a 90 day share price return of 43.76%...
